toto.plugins.wave.wave_spectra¶

class toto.plugins.wave.wave_spectra.WaveAnalysis(pandas_obj)[source]¶

Bases: object

ssh_to_wave(sea_level='sea_level', args={'Crossing': {'Downcrossing': True, 'Upcrossing': False}, 'Detrend': {'Off': True, 'constante': False, 'linear': False}, 'Method': {'spectra': True, 'zero-crossing': False}, 'Minimum number of waves per window for zero crossing analysis': 30, 'Nfft': 3600, 'Overlap': 1800, 'Wave period range (min and max) (in s)': [3, 25], 'Windows': 3600})[source]¶

This function transform a timeseries of elevation to Hs using: -Spectra method - zero-crossing method

wave_spectra(sea_level='sea_level', args={'Detrend': {'Off': True, 'constante': False, 'linear': False}, 'Nfft': 3600, 'Overlap': 1800, 'Period (s) min and max for plotting': [10, 1000], 'Windows': 3600, 'Xaxis': {'frequency': False, 'period': True}, 'display': {'Off': False, 'On': True}, 'folder out': '/home/remy/software/TOTO/Toto/docs', 'units': 'm'})[source]¶

This function estimated the 1D wave spectrum (Power Spectral Density) and plot it

wavelet_analysis(sea_level='sea_level', args={'Mother wavelet': {'DOG': False, 'Morlet': True, 'Paul': False}, 'Number of sub-ocatve per period band': 8, 'Wave period range (min and max) (in s)': [3, 25], 'display': {'Off': False, 'On': True}, 'folder out': '/home/remy/software/TOTO/Toto/docs', 'units': 'm'})[source]¶

This function estimates the wavelet power spectrum of a time series, as well as the scaled-averaged wavelet power time series within a specific period band. The code is based on the wavelet toolbox from Torrence and Compo See https://paos.colorado.edu/research/wavelets/software.html
